subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Slick cobblestones proved treacherous at the second edition of La Course by Le Tour de France as nearly half the field, 57 riders, abandoned the race.
snippet: Slick cobblestones proved treacherous at the second edition of La Course by Le Tour de France as nearly half the field, 57 riders, abandoned the race.
